name: Hyobok Ahn
bio: I'm specialized in Tizen & Tizen RT porting on custom board hardwares. I have experiences in supporting the design of IoT gateway and sensor devices with public Cloud services, such as Samsung SmartThings and AWS.

name: Johnny Nam
bio: I have experiences in Tizen Driver porting projects for Wlan/BT/codec and IoT device development projects based on various scenarios. I also have participated in a network audio project for controlling devices by voice using Amazon Alexa and a door lock project for confirming visitors' identification remotely using the Amazon Cloud platform.

name: Jinseog Bang
bio: Iâ€™m interested in data reduction communication of composite sensors. I was in charge of H/W projects using composite sensors at my previous work and I have experiences in hardware production for collecting sensor data using Zigbee and BLE. I am currently working as a hardware consultant for start-up companies at MakerSpace.
